resume.skillmessage: As a supervisor I develop excellent communication and organizational skills alongside my programming and computer skills.

education.description: Describe your experience at school, what you learned, what useful skills you have acquired etc.

work.title: Supervisor
work.description: Working with Lab Managers to curate presentations with management information forwarded to other supervisors. Responsible for providing initial training for new Computer Room Consultants and ongoing training for current Computer Room Consultants. Responsible for scheduling Computer Room Consultants shifts to ensure all open classroom or lab hours are covered.

work.title: Computer Room Consultant
work.description: It was my responsibility to  provide students and faculty with access to functioning computing and multimedia environments that allow them to achieve their academic goals. Review and implement policy and/or procedural changes for the IET computer classroom. Manage a computer classroom and provide technical support needed to clients in the computer classroom.

projects.title: Wizard Duel
projects.category: A small game made in unity where two wizards duel in a rock, paper, sciossors style system.

projects.title: Hackathon Game
projects.category: A small game made in Haxe and HaxeFlixel where two players attempt to shoot each other but can only shoot down.

testimonials.text: From the time I met him, it was clear that he is a dedicated, determined, and focused student.  It has been equally clear that he is also a sincere, reliable, thoughtful and caring person â€“ a combination that is increasingly hard to find.
